text: Hagi ana zama fore huno evutesanige'za, mago kini ne'moma nemania kna huno 70'a kafumofo agu'afi, Tairi kumara zamagera kanintegahaze. Hianagi ana 70'a kafuma evutesnigeno'a, mago monko a'mofo agire vare zagame'ma nehaza zagamemo'a, Tairi kumamofo avate fore hugahie. Ana zagamepina amanage hu'ne.
